He aint saying that you can't share.  You just posted it under "Video>Highres-Movies"  not under "Video Clips" like all the others.  It causes the search engine to list it like a High Resolution full movie, not a clip so, it is great and thank you but classified under the wrong heading.  You can't tell that it says total time 2 minutes xx seconds until after you click what looks like a full movie heading.  That all.  Just up/down loading etiquette on knowing what your doing when shareing.  Thanx!!!
